net.javachallenge.api

Interface Game


  • public interface Game
    A class that represents the whole state of the game. The all information of the game can be retrieved from the instance of this class. Note that this interface is immutable, thus, its object stores the information of just this turn and will not be updated.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AlienTrade getAlienTrade()
      Returns the alien trade for providing the market rate information.
      PlayerTrade getDemand(int playerId, Material material)
      Returns the existing demand with the specified material from the specified player or, null if no offer.
      java.util.ArrayList<PlayerTrade> getDemands(int playerId)
      Returns the existing demand list with the specified player as a copied mutable list.
      java.util.ArrayList<PlayerTrade> getDemands(Material material)
      Returns the existing demand list with the specified material as a copied mutable list.
      Field getField()
      Returns the field which contains the veins and the squads.
      Player getMyPlayer()
      Returns your player, which is the active player, because your program is executed when your player is active.
      int getMyPlayerId()
      Returns your player id, which is the active player, because your program is executed when your player is active.
      int getNeutralPlayerId()
      Returns the neutral player id, which is constant value.

      Returns the existing offer with the specified material from the specified player or, null if no offer.

      Returns the existing offer list with the specified player as a copied mutable list.
      java.util.ArrayList<PlayerTrade> getOffers(Material material)
      Returns the existing offer list with the specified material as a copied mutable list.
      Player getPlayer(int id)
      Returns the Player instance with the specified player id.
      int getPlayerCount()
      Returns the number of the players.
      java.util.ArrayList<Player> getPlayers()
      Returns the all players participating in the game without the neutral player as a copied mutable list.
      java.util.ArrayList<PlayerTrade> getPlayerTrades()
      Returns the existing trades (offers and demands) as a copied mutable list.
      int getRound()
      Returns the number of the current round.
      GameSetting getSetting()
      Returns the settings of this game.
      java.util.ArrayList<Player> getSurvivedPlayers()
      Deprecated. 
      java.util.ArrayList<Player> getSurvivingPlayers()
      Returns the surviving players participating in the game without the neutral player as a copied mutable list.
      int getTotalMoneyWhenSellingAllMaterials(int playerId)
      Returns the total money which is sum of the and all own materials of the bank with the specified player id.
      boolean isSurvivingPlayer(int playerId)
      Returns the boolean whether the specified player is surviving.
